page.title: 08The Market Gardener's Day
page.content: My dad is a market gardener. He grows{cabbages, lettuce, cauliflowers, {potatoes, sprouts, onions}and {calabrese.}His day starts at{5:00}when he goes out into the field to cut {cauliflowers}and{cabbages}for market. At{9:00}he has a cup of coffee before starting the planting. My dad has his dinner at{1:00}and he usually goes to sleep for an hour. When he wakes up he goes to market in{Cheltenham.}On returning from market at{3:30}he continues with the planting until {5:30.}All the family have tea then, and after tea my dad turns on the {irrigation system}if it is dry. When he has finished that job he comes in and watches television until{10:00}and then he goes to bed. All the crops he grows are graded in class I, II or III as set by the {EEC}and are sold to a local market.
